name: Boardroom Blitz
description:
The corporate turn-based strategy game that pits business against business in a cloak-and-dagger battle for the ages. Use the budget and intrigue at your disposal to spy, rob and backstab your foes.

In active development! I'll be updating and working on this on a frequent basis, and would love your feedback on how you feel about the game. Many aspects are unfinished and may change entirely, so please let me know anything you like/dislike by commenting.
